casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. ROBINSON
v.
LUDLE 2019-0264 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 8, 2019

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

On respondent's motion for judgment on the pleadings. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. KENNEDY, FRENCH, FISCHER, DEWINE, DONNELLY, and STEWART, JJ., concur. O'CONNOR, C.J., not participating.
